definition: to cherish the outmoded and preserve the outworn (idiom); conservative/stickler for tradition
to hold/to carry (in one's arms)/to hug/to embrace/to surround/to cherish
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining
deficiency/lack/scarce/vacant post/to run short of

sentences.english: Being traditional does not mean being old-fashioned or outmoded.
sentences.chinese: 保持传统并非意味着抱残守缺或冥顽不化。

sentences.english: The Government, he said, were sticking to stale ideas.
sentences.chinese: 他说政府仍在抱残守缺。

sentences.english: The Qing government was conservative diehards against the reformers change.
sentences.chinese: 清政府顽固派却抱残守缺，反对维新变革。

sentences.english: Being happy doesn't have to mean that everything is perfect but rather you are looking beyond the imperfections.
sentences.chinese: 开心并非是指事事完美无缺，而是你不再抱残守缺。

definition: (idiom) to continue in the same old rut/diehard conservative attitudes
stuck in the old ways (idiom); refusing to acknowledge new ideas/stagnating and conservative
conservative and unable to adapt (idiom)
hidebound by convention (idiom)
to swallow ancient learning without digesting it (idiom)/to be pedantic without having a mastery of one's subject
conservative/reactionary
to shut one's eyes and stop one's ears/out of touch with reality/to bury one's head in the sand
to revere the past and neglect the present (idiom)
ridiculous self-importance (idiom); arrogance
lit. to build a cart behind closed doors/to be overly subjective and disregard the outside world (idiom)
to stand still without advancing (idiom); to hesitate and hold back
to follow a set routine
to discard the old and introduce the new (idiom); to innovate
to pick up what others say (idiom); to pass off other people's opinions as one's own/to parrot
to follow in other people's footsteps
change of string, move out of rut (idiom); dramatic change of direction/to dance to a different tune
